DDL.statement: CREATE VIEW view_process_order AS ( SELECT [APP_PROCESS_ORDER].[PROCESS_ORDER], [APP_PROCESS_ORDER].MATERIAL, [APP_MATERIAL].[MATERIAL_TYPE], [APP_PROCESS_ORDER].[DUE_DATE], [APP_PROCESS_ORDER].STATUS, [APP_MATERIAL].DESCRIPTION, [APP_PROCESS_ORDER_RESOURCE].[BATCH_SUFFIX] FROM [APP_PROCESS_ORDER_RESOURCE] RIGHT JOIN [APP_PROCESS_ORDER] ON [APP_PROCESS_ORDER_RESOURCE].[REQUIRED_RESOURCE] = [APP_PROCESS_ORDER].[REQUIRED_RESOURCE] LEFT JOIN [APP_MATERIAL] ON [APP_MATERIAL].MATERIAL = [APP_PROCESS_ORDER].MATERIAL)
